text: We'll hear arguments next in the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System v. Investment Company Institute.
Thank you, Mr. Chief Justice, and may it please the Court:
Frankfurter was addressing the Federal Reserve operations, was he?
--He was referring to the Federal Reserve Board's supervision of the securities industry in an analogous situation, and he said that,
Mr. Chief Justice and may it please the Court:
Mr. Chief Justice, I will not detain the Court over-long.
